metadata.title: CVE-2023-26605 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel 6.0.8, there is a use-after-free ininode_cgwb_move_to_attached in fs/fs-writeback.c, related to__list_del_entry_valid.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-26605` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
